title: (x) Tazo Tea label - Nicholas Cochin, Nuptial Script {Stephen, Yves}
content:
Does anyone know what's the typeface used for tazo tea's text on the package or any similar available?  
Here's a sample from it?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Tazo\_tea.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516103002/http:/typophile.com/files/Tazo_tea.jpg) | 90.85 KB |
author: kco

comments.content: The script at the bottom of the label is [Nuptial Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516103002/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.120961.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=caffeine-free%2Fsans+caf%C3%A9ine&sampleSize=24)
Oh you're right! I didn't check too closely what I thought to be the NC itals.
